title: SOV 350 Apple Green for a SOV 350 Apple Green?
author: Marslife

posts.post_title: SOV 350 Apple Green for a SOV 350 Apple Green?
posts.post_content:
Hey All!

Call it a mental lapse or maybe early onset dementia? 

Somehow I ended up with two T206 Tommy Leach (bending over) Apple Greens.  I would like to trade this one (picture below). Graded PSA 2 Good.

I would like to trade it for a T206 Sov 350 Apple Green Lefty Leifield (Batting).  I would consider a lesser grade for your troubles. 

thanks for looking!!  email or PM if there is any interest.

Thanks again!

Cliff
